_comment: The English US language file for Chocolate Quest Repoured Mod!
This translation was created by basically every dev and polished out by ArloTheEpic
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.white: White eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.orange: Orange eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.magenta: Magenta eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.light_blue: Light blue eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.yellow: Yellow eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.lime: Light green eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.pink: Pink eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.gray: Gray eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.silver: Silver eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.cyan: Cyan eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.purple: Purple eyes of the wither skull
item.banner.cq_wither_eyes.blue: Blue eyes of the wither skull

item.banner.cq_bones.lime: Light green bones of the dead
description.gui_exporter: Creative only block for exporting dungeons. Select the area you want to export, and then save it.
description.gui_exporter_part_mode: Splits the structure into 16x16x16 cubes for usually faster exportation and generation. Recommended to keep checked.
description.gui_exporter_relative_mode: Uses coordinates relative to the exporter block. The Selection Helper item takes care whether this is checked or not.
description.gui_exporter_ignore_entities: Ignores all entities which are not listed in cqrepoured.cfg -> advanced -> specialEntities. It is recommended to keep checked.
description.spider_armor: Wear the spider to become the spider. A full set allows you to climb walls and jump much higher.
description.spider_sword: Flowing forth from the fangs that made this simple sword a toxic blade, Shelob's poison can't be stayed once your foe is stuck by this blade.
description.bull_armor: Wear the bull to become the bull. A full set allows you to charge forward at great speed, destroying everything in your path.
description.great_sword: Hold right click to strike a large area.
description.turtle_armor: The Giant Tortoise's power, should you fashion a full set from its shell, will allow you to regain health much faster. The shell prevents most forms of damage from the rear, as well.
description.slime_armor: With a full set of the regenerating goo touching your skin, you can feel your maximum health overflowing, and whenever you are damaged, a small slime may appear which can restore your health, if you can reach it.
description.cloud_boots: Those who tread to the angels song the prophets say can do no wrong. A single leap becomes a bound, a brisk walk breaks the speed of sound, no fall can stop the chosen few, and with these boots, that extends to you!
_comment: description.dragon_helmet.name=You can feel the dragon's power coursing through your veins. Attacks that once were a threat to you seem meaningless now, yet your own strikes are twice as strong!
description.dagger: Right click while moving to leap forward
description.ninja_dagger: Right click while moving to leap forward. They say the wielder of this dagger could, at will, vanish without a trace. You can probably mimic this behavior with a sneaking right-click, but while you'll vanish from sight, you can't go far.
description.bull_battle_axe: Grux right-click ground. Make earthquake. Travel forward. Smash enemies real good. Grux like.
description.walker_set: Legend has it that any who fired an arrow upon the Walker King would find a blade in their back and a Walker King behind them. Perhaps collecting both his sword and his shield would allow you to utilize a similar ability?
description.magic_bell: Ring the bell and you will see the path to the Lich's Phylactery. Break the blocks the bell shows you and the dungeon's walls will yield to you.
description.teleport_stone: A mystical object created by an ancient race. Hold Right click to set a position, then do it again to teleport there. Sneak while holding Right-click to remove the saved location.
description.staff_fire: The flames consume those who cross your path, a simple right-click and they'll feel your wrath. Also lights torches.
description.staff_spider: Right-click to shoot your goo, my dude.
description.staff_gun: It's a gun. On a stick. Man, those dwarves are geniuses.
description.staff_healing: A magical implement used to apply potion effects by touching the tip to a target. Though historically usually used for healing effects, some generals have made great use of other potions as well. How the staff's potion effect is changed is a closely guarded secret.
description.soul_bottle: Left-click a mob to store it, right-click to summon that mob. Sneak and right-click to summon the mob and empty the bottle. Place inside a single-use spawner to set the mobs that spawner will spawn.
description.flamethrower: Undertech Prototype Fyrebird mk7 22mm nozzle flame expulsion unit. A right-mouse press should expel fire directly forwards. Internal Gel Cartridges should be able to extract slime from anywhere in the inventory. Current model requires regular reload, as no regenerating source of slime has been discovered.
description.badge: Creative only item. Right-click with it to open a GUI. Left-click a mob to attach it to that mob. Items placed inside will be dropped when the attached mob dies.
description.alchemy_bag: Shift-right-click to open. Only stores potions. When right clicking with it, it throws the first potion in the bag it finds.
_comment: description.woodshot.name=Right-click to shoot hook. Once the hook hits a wooden block, you will be pulled to it.
description.hookshot: Right-click to shoot hook. Once the hook hits a block, you will be pulled to it.
description.longshot: Right-click to shoot hook. Once the hook hits a block, you will be pulled to it.
_comment: description.manualhook.name=Right-click to shoot hook. Once the hook hits a block, you can hold right-click to move closer to it, and sneak while doing so to move away from it.
description.spidershot.name=Right-click to shoot web. Once the hook hits a block, you can hold right-click to move closer to it, and sneak while doing so to move away from it.
description.hooksword.name=Right-click to shoot hook. Once the hook hits a block, you can hold right-click to move closer to it, and sneak while doing so to move away from it.
description.moonlight: The inscription on the blade reads "My power can only be awakened in the light of the moon"
description.sunshine: The inscription on the blade reads "My power can only be awakened in the light of the sun"
description.staff_vampiric: This rod radiates dark energy as you hold it in your hand. If you move it near your ear you will hear its demand. Its call is simple: "Right-click with me" and when you do then you will see, a projectile it does emit. Though the damage is slight, if you land it just right, it will heal you when it does hit.
description.staff_wind: Whatever incredible magical power this once held, it is currently completely dormant. (Whatever this is supposed to do, it doesn't work yet. #TODO)
description.staff_poison: Venom bubbles at the tip, careful that it doesn't drip, it eats through skin and flesh and bone, best be careful it's not your own. Shoot it out at your own peril, and beware that not all would call it a fair kill...
description.staff: A long strong stick. There's probably someone out there who knows how to apply magic to it.
description.staff_thunder: The gem atop this staff sputters and sparks with electric charge. With a right-click, to hit your mark, one could simply redirect the arc.
description.spiked_glove: With the claws of a beast, and the strength of your arm, these gloves shall lead you far from harm. While wielding two, enjoy the view, for walls no longer hinder you.
description.spear_diamond: A well-made weapon with longer reach than a sword. Right-click to charge an extended thrust.
description.dummy_shield: A rough approximation of what a shield is supposed to look like. Will not protect you from attacks. An exported dummy that is holding this will instead be holding the usual shield for its mob type when its dungeon generates.
description.giant_spider_poison: This stuff is crazy corrosive! Definitely far too dangerous for you to work with, but maybe there's a toxin expert you can talk to about crafting with it.
description.feather_golden: Take up a feather, gild it in gold, take a great leap and believe in the powers of old. You won't be harmed, provided you're armed, with the feather of Gold. But use sparingly, my falling friend, if the feather breaks, your life may end.
description.scale_turtle: One of a few pieces of the Giant Tortoise's shell you managed to salvage. Its sheer strength is such that none of your tools can even chip it. Perhaps there's someone out there with stronger crafting tools than yours who you can convince to lend you a hand?
description.horn_bull: This horn is tough enough that you could probably make a great weapon with it if you knew how to craft with animal horns. Maybe there's a craftsman out there who's more experiened on the subject.
description.leather_bull: Very high quality leather. The right craftsman could probably use this to forge the most aerodynamic gear you've ever seen!
description.ball_slime: Amazing. Slime with regeneration powers. The fact that it always returns to the same shape makes it difficult to work with, but the right craftsman could probably use this to make some gear with health-manipulating abilities, and any weapons that use slime as ammo are going to get a lot out of this stuff.
description.bone_monking: Whatever primal energy made the Monking so much more powerful than his peers still clings to his bones. Perhaps the right craftsman would know how to work with such power?
description.leather_spider: The Giant Spider's hide still sticks to everything it touches. It's too gross for you to touch for a long period of time, but a craftsman who's more accustomed to such work can probably fashion this into something neat.
description.king_crown: Can be worn on its own, or combined with a helmet. Either way, you'll look as regal as you've always felt.
description.bubble_pistol: Undertech Commercial Turbo Dampener 33.6mm nozzle bubble explusion unit. A right-mouse press will expell a quick flurry of bubbles, large enough to capture a horse and drift upward. Bubbles are non-lethal, but can't say so much for the fall. Hold down Right Mouse Button for a steady stream.
description.bubble_rifle: Undertech Prototype advanced Turbo Dampener. Not for public access. Expells liquid faster and further than a traditional bubble gun, and holding the Right Mouse button lasts for longer. Unfortunately, reloading it is far slower.
description.path_tool: Sneak+Left Click an entity to apply the path to that entity.%sLeft Click an entity to copy the path of that entity.%sSneak+Right Click a block to add a new path node.%sRight Click a block to select an existing path node.%sSneak+Right Click air to clear the current path.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.igno: When checked the input does not have to be similar in terms of meta data. For example you set a diamond sword as input, it will also accept damaged diamond swords for it.
When checked the input does not have to be similar in terms of nbt data. For example you set a diamond sword as input, it will also accept enchanted diamond swords for it.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.repu: Reputation with the traders faction required to use this trade. Set it to "NONE" to not require any reputation.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.adva: Advancement required to use this trade. Specify an advancements resourcelocation (for example "minecraft:story/mine_stone) or leave it blank to not require any advancement.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.stoc: Check this to set that this trade has a stock count. This means that this trade has a limited use.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.rest: Amount of uses it will increase when it gets restocked. Every time you buy something, it will restock a different trade that is not maxed out.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.in_s: Current amount of uses the trade has.
description.gui_merchant_edit_trade.max_: Highest amount of uses the trade can have.
description.gui_button_trade.out_of_stoc: Out of stock! If possible buy something else, then maybe the trade will be in stock again.
enchantment.cqrepoured.lightning_protect: Protects you from lightning when applied to a helmet.
enchantment.cqrepoured.spectral.desc: Increased damage towards endermen and abyss walkers. Highly recommended when fighting the walker king.
_comment: This name should be the same as the walker king name
advancements.cqrepoured.root.title: Chocolate Quest Repoured
advancements.cqrepoured.ha_got_you.title: Ha! Got You!
advancements.cqrepoured.ha_got_you.descr: Get killed by a CQR mob
advancements.cqrepoured.challenger.title: Challenger of the Chocolate
advancements.cqrepoured.champion.title: Champion of the Chocolate
advancements.cqrepoured.champion.descrip: Defeat every CQR Boss at least once
Now I'm a tank! Obtain a full set of Tortoiseshell armor
advancements.cqrepoured.kill_lich.title: What is dead may still yet die!
advancements.cqrepoured.kill_giant_spide: ...is a dead spider! Defeat a giant spider
Kill the feared leader of the endermen, the great ender king!
advancements.cqrepoured.kill_ender_calam: Win a heroic volleyball match of death against the conjured evil.
